item.title: #1 Project Introduction (Chained by Eternity)
item.description:
Welcome to my Devlog for Chained by Eternity . Chained by Eternity is an ambitious project, and I want to take you along on my journey as I tackle upcoming challenges of game development. As someone who enjoys reading how fellow game developers solve their problems, I hope this devlog might be helpful or inspiring to others as well.

Intention and Goals

This project began during my job search after graduating from university. I applied to several game studios and, unsurprisingly, was rejected by most of them almost immediately. That taught me a hard but valuable lesson: no matter how much knowledge or experience I might have, it doesn’t mean much if I can’t show and prove it.
